item.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales
item.description: After the smash hit of the first three and the downer that was Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides, I was cautiously hopeful that they could pull something off with Dead Men Tell No Tales. And… they did? Sort of?
